name: 그레텔과 윈슬로의 별장
description:
"Dear Gretel. Let's meet again after three nights. You have to be a nice girl. - Mom and Dad "



Little girl Gretel heads to Madame Winslow's Mansion on an errand from her parents.
The note given by her parents says that they will pick her up after three nights.
Now Gretel stays at Madame Winslow's Mansion and helps her with her work for three days.

But
The Mansion, Madame Winslow, and Gilbert the butler,
They seem to be hiding something behind a friendly attitude.

Look into objects and get items.
Solve the puzzle properly and find out the secret of the mansion.

Will Gretel be able to return safely to her parents' arms after three days?

Explore the mansion, collect objects, and solve the puzzles.
Madame Winslow's Mansion has several rooms.
Look into the rooms to follow the given to-do list. Click to get the required items, and accomplish the missions.
Of course, it depends on your choice 'How' you will accomplish what you have to do. Follow the advice.



Find out the Truth and collect the endings.
Follow the story and make appropriate choices in various branches. Depending on your choices, you can have a total of 4 different endings.
Please help Gretel go home safely and have a happy ending.
Simply getting out of the mansion is not the end of everything. Be careful always.
